title: The Wicked + The Divine Vol. 1
description: Every 90 years or so, twelve gods incarnate in the bodies of the young. They are charismatic and brilliant. They stand before crowds, speak in tongues, and send them into rapture. They’re rumored to perform secretive miracles. They save people’s lives, either metaphorically or literally.They are loved. They are hated. They are brilliant.Within two years, they’re dead.
author: Kieron Gillen
